articles.content:
As per renowned analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, Apple's third generation AirPods will enter mass production in Q3 of 2021, which means Q3 is the earliest they can become available.

articles.title: Nokia G10 specs leaked ahead of April 8 announcement - PhoneArena
articles.description: Nokia G10 is another handset that's likely to be introduced on April 8, and judging by its leaked specs, this is going to be one of the cheapest Nokia smartphones showcased at the event.
